title: OneNutS
author: OneNutS
created_time: July 26, 2023, 05:36:55 AMLast edit: October 13, 2023, 02:57:30 PM by OneNutS
content: HXA token is the native utility token of the Herencia Artifex platform and is compliant with the ERC-20 token standard for the Ethereum chain with mature security performance, processing power, and various durability features.   More details on the website:  https://www.hxacoin.io/   ● Bounty Campaign Round 1 Dates: July 26 - August 09  lasts for 2 weeks.● Tokens will be distributed to participants within 2 months after the end of the Bounty Campaign.● Daily stakes! Do tasks every day and make reports every 3 days !● Tokens will be distributed to participants within 2 months after the end of the Bounty Campaign in the Coinsbit registration Email: ( https://coinsbit.io )● Join HXA on social media:- Telegram - Twitter- Discord● You will receive stakes for performing certain actions, after the end of the bounty campaign, the stakes will be converted into tokens, according to the formula (total number of tokens/total number of stakes)*number of your stakes.● Please read the terms and conditions carefully. For non-compliance, even minor, you will not receive stakes or will be excluded from the bounty program.● Use of multi-accounts, spam, bots and other is strictly forbidden, all attempts will be banned.● Bounty managers reserve the right to change the conditions of the bounty campaign. ● Make reports in a separate post every 3 days. DO NOT QUOTE YOUR OLD REPORT🙏!● Please, read the terms carefully. For non-compliance with requirements, you will not get stakes or be excluded from the bounty program. Follow all updates in this thread and Telegram chats: HXAcoin Bounty,  HXAcoin Chat , Aladdin Center●  Format for proof of authentication post:Code: Proof of authentication:- Coinsbit registration Email: ( https://coinsbit.io )- Telegram Username:- Campaigns applied for:* Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.Bounty campaign reward pool: 26 500 HXA tokens will be distributed through this bounty campaign. * Bounty Aladdin Center has escrowed and guarantees the reward distribution of this bounty.  Rewards dislocation:● Video:  20%● Article:  20%● Twitter : 25%● Telegram: 15%● Discord: 10%● Reserve fund - 10%Rewards:  ● Excellent: 4 stakes (High quality video and >4000 subscribers)● High: 3 stakes (Good quality video and >2000 subscribers )● Good: 2 stake (Average quality video and >1000 subscribers)● Average: 1 stake (Average quality video and >400 subscribers)Rules:  ● Join HXA on social media:- Telegram - Twitter- Discord● Each participant can send:                                             - YouTube - 4 videos ( No more than  2  video a week )                                            - Tiktok - 4 videos ( No more than 2 video a week )● Participant's account should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the video campaign and have at least 300 subscribers.● The video description must include 70+ words of original text about the company HXAcoin● You must have at least (minimum) 100 views under your video to get the stakes● Please note, if the video has 0 views it will be rated at 0 stakes!● Content topics:  -  Information can be used from social networks: https://www.hxacoin.io/   https://herencia.gitbook.io/herencia-white-paper/  and use hashtags:  #HXA #Herencia #minigame #NFT ● Only original video content will be accepted. Copy from the project website, YouTube channels or from others' work will be rejected.● Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered.● High engagements but poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality.● Videos should never be removed. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.● All videos need to have a link to the Proof of Authentication, project's website, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel or any other social media.● Please provide enough details of the bounty hunter at the end of the video to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!● By joining this program, all participants accept that the project's team can use all these videos as marketing materials.● Article and Video submission form will be closed 3 days before the end of the bounty.● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  HXAcoin Bounty, Aladdin CenterHow to join:  1.  Join HXA on social media:- Telegram - Twitter- Discord3. Write a good video about HXA  project4. Post it on your website, Tiktok, YouTube5. Submit it here:  * Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.Rewards:● Excellent: 4 stakes● High: 3 stakes● Good: 2 stakes● Average: 1 stakeRules:● Each participant can write 4 original  article only ( No more than 2 per week )● Articles should be quality and unique with a minimum of 500 words.● Views and comments at least 10 likes/comments/upvotes or 100 claps would be taken note of.● Participant's forum accounts should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the article campaign.● Articles should be published on blogs recommended by us: Steemit, Reddit, BitcoinTalk, Medium and LinkedIn and must be publicly accessible.Other high ranked blogs may be accepted.● In the description of a Article, you have to write 70+ words of original text about the company https://www.hxacoin.io/  ● Content topics:Information can be used from social networks https://www.hxacoin.io/   https://herencia.gitbook.io/herencia-white-paper/ and use hashtags: #HXA #Herencia #minigame #NFT ● Only quality and original content will be accepted. Articles should never be removed. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.● Published Articles must include at least 2 images of the project, link to the Proof of Authentication, project's website, Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel or any other social media.● Please provide enough details of the writer at the end of the article to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!● By joining this program, all participants accept that the project's team can use all these articles as marketing materials● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  HXAcoin Bounty, Aladdin CenterHow to join:1.  Join HXA on social media:- Telegram - Twitter- Discord2. Write a good article about https://www.hxacoin.io/ project3. Post it on your website, Medium, LinkedIn, Steemit, Reddit, BitcoinTalk, etc.:4. Submit it here:  * Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.Rewards:● Have more than 300 followers: 1 stake per one tweet or retweet /week ● Have more than 1000 followers: 2 stake per one tweet or retweet /week ● Have more than 3000 followers: 3 stake per one tweet or retweet /week● Have more than 5000 followers: 4 stake per one tweet or retweet /week● Have more than 10000 followers: 5 stake per one tweet or retweet /weekRules:● Must have at least 300 followers and make privacy settings open for your page.● Follow and like the official Twitter account● Make 1 post every day. Use information from official social networks.  ● Make 1 repost every day. Like a post when you make a repost. Use information from official social networks. Use hashtag #HXAcoin● DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT ! ● Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked and deleted● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  HXAcoin Bounty, Aladdin Center● Please, post all the links to your work in this thread at the end of every week as a new post. Do not quote or edit your previous week report.How to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Make reports every 3 days using this format: Code:● Twitter Report ●- Day: XX - XX- Twitter Profile:- Retweet Link #1....- Tweet Link#1....- Retweet Link #2....- Tweet Link#2....- Retweet Link #3....- Tweet Link#3....Rewards:● 1 comment = 1 stakes (10 stakes/week)● 20 stakes once for wearing a “Your Name | HXAcoin” + LOGO.Rules:● Join  - Telegram● Write at least 2 constructive messages per day in top exchange’s telegram groups (Example: Binance, Kucoin, Gate.io, MEXC etc). Posting messages on other groups won’t be counted.● DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT !● Write comments in a crypto related group, mentioning the  HXAcoin● Continue the comment of the previous person. Your comment should flow into the dialogue and continue the person’s thought. ● It is forbidden to make meaningless and unconscious comments, spam. Comments like: Hi!, Hello!, Good project - will not be counted. Don't spam all comments in a row, don’t write  silly phrases! Spam and low quality will not be counted. ● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  HXAcoin Bounty, Aladdin Center● Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked and deleted.Name: Your name | HXAcoin Ambassador.Avatar: How to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Make reports  every 3 days  using this format::Code: ● Telegram Report ●- Day XX - XX- Username link: (Example: https://t.me/username)- Telegram comments:- Comment Link #1:- Comment Link #2:- Comment Link #3:- Comment Link #4:- Comment Link #5:.- Comment Link #6:* Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.                            Rewards:● 10 stakes/week  (maximum of 10 posts/comment per week)● You can write a maximum of 2 posts/comment per dayRules:●  Must follow project Discord account● Write at least 10 constructive messages in this list: https://disboard.org/servers/tag/crypto  Posts/messages must be constructive and in a way that will not be considered spamming.● DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT !● DO NOT use hashtags !!! For using hashtags - 0 stakes!● You can write a maximum of 2 posts/comment per day● Continue the comment of the previous person. Your comment should flow into the dialogue and continue the person’s thought.● It is forbidden to make meaningless and unconscious comments, spam. Comments like: Hi!, Hello!, Good project - will not be counted. Don't spam all comments in a row, don’t write silly phrases! Spam and low quality will not be counted.● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  HXAcoin Bounty, Aladdin CenterHow to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Make weekly report in this thread using this format:Code:● Discord Report ●- Week:- Discord Profile link:- Discord comments:1: Link to Screenshot of Comment 2: Link to Screenshot of Comment 3: Link to Screenshot of Comment...etc.* Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.
